mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, user_id, name, password, phone, email_id, email_server,zipcode,addr) values(seq_member.nextval, #{user_id},#{name},#{password},#{phone},#{email_id},#{email_server},#{zipcode},#{addr})
mapper.select: select * from member where user_id=#{user_id} and password=#{password}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
SELECT * FROM member ORDER BY member_id DESC
